name: Salmon and Avocado Salad
author: CEEJAYDEE
summary: This is a quick, fresh, light salad that makes a nice lunch or a light summer dinner.
ingredients: 1 pinch kosher salt and ground black pepper to taste
1 pinch chili powder, or to taste
directions: Preheat oven to 425 degrees F (220 degrees C)
Line a baking sheet with parchment paper; place salmon fillet on top
Bake salmon in the preheated oven until easily flaked with a fork, about 15 minutes
Flake into bite-sized pieces with a fork
Combine cooled salmon, avocados, grape tomatoes, red bell pepper, and green onions in a large bowl
Drizzle lime juice and olive oil on top
Add kosher salt, black pepper, and chili powder; toss gently distribute evenly
Chill salad until flavors combine, 2 hours to overnight
